subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mark Fidrych — pumping his fists, waving his arms, jumping around the mound as if it were a stage — brought a rock and roll beat to the deliberate pace and serious sensibility of baseball.
snippet: Mark Fidrych — pumping his fists, waving his arms, jumping around the mound as if it were a stage — brought a rock and roll beat to the deliberate pace and serious sensibility of baseball.
